summary: This mod simply makes all the Dragons in Skyrim hardcore including Alduin
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][b][i][color=#b22222]Dragons Reborn[/color][/i][/b][/size]
[color=#00ff00][size=3]This mod simply makes all the Dragons in Skyrim hardcore including Alduin
It does this by making all the dragons in the game stronger, through more health and health regeneration, as well as making the dragons deal more damage. [/size][/color]
author: Atronachades
